record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business for up to 60 minutes, with each Senator permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, with the first half of the time under the control of the majority and the second half of the time under the control of the minority.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
